name: DFRCT
description:
Dwarf Fortress Remote Connection Tester

This tool lets you test connection to your Dwarf Fortress Remote server before purchasing the actual DF Remote application.

This is useful if your server is behind a firewall or NAT and you're unsure DF Remote will work. Please note that results may differ when you switch between a cellular and different Wi-Fi networks. You should test the same connection(s) you're intending to use to play.

Visit mifki.com/df/setup for instructions on setting up a DF Remote server.
